-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Generates data to be used with flamegraph.pl from .prof files.
--   
@package ghc-prof-flamegraph
@version 0.1.2.1


-- | Parser for .prof files generated by GHC.
module ProfFile
data Time
Time :: Double -> Double -> Time
tIndividual :: Time -> Double
tInherited :: Time -> Double
data Line
Line :: String -> String -> Int -> Int -> Time -> Time -> [Line] -> Line
lCostCentre :: Line -> String
lModule :: Line -> String
lNumber :: Line -> Int
lEntries :: Line -> Int
lTime :: Line -> Time
lAlloc :: Line -> Time
lChildren :: Line -> [Line]
lInheritedTime :: Line -> Double
lIndividualTime :: Line -> Double

-- | Returns a function accepting the children and returning a fully formed
--   <a>Line</a>.
parseLine :: String -> Either String ([Line] -> Line)
parse :: String -> Either String [Line]
instance Show Time
instance Eq Time
instance Show Line
instance Eq Line
